entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon.
